"Hello, my name is Anis and I'm a web developer based in Paris, France. I began my coding journey by studying Node.js and React at OCR (openclassroom), an online school that provides resources and a platform for students to work on projects independently. You can find some of my projects on my Github page

In addition to programming, I have a passion for graphic design and enjoy exploring various forms of art and filmmaking in my free time. If you're interested, you can check out some of my work on my Instagram account. When I'm not coding or creating art, I love immersing myself in the worlds of cinema and video games. If you're not a fan of these topics, don't worry - I promise not to talk your ear off!

If you have a project in mind, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'd love to discuss it over a cup of coffee. Thanks for visiting my portfolio website and I look forward to hearing from you!"
